en.tagline: ‚ú® Organize your day with purpose and clarity
en.heroDescription: Organize your tasks in intelligent time blocks. Focus on what matters. Achieve your goals.
en.questionTitle: Do you feel like you need more time to complete your tasks?
en.methodDescription: Assign specific time blocks to each task. Improve your focus, reduce procrastination, and accomplish more in less time.
en.featuresDescription: Every feature is designed to simplify your day and maximize your productivity
en.topPrioritiesDesc: Focus on the 3-5 most important tasks of the day. No distractions, just results.
en.brainDumpDesc: Free your mind by dumping all your ideas and pending tasks in a safe, organized place.
en.smartScheduleDesc: Plan your day hour by hour, assigning specific time to each important activity.
en.smartMetricsDesc: Visualize your progress and productivity patterns with actionable insights.
en.aiAdviceDesc: Receive personalized recommendations to optimize your time and energy.
en.pricingDescription: Start free and scale when you need more
en.footer: ¬© 2025 Timebox. Organize your day with purpose and clarity.
